```
# Read the gene expression data from the file
gene_data <- read.table("leukemiaExp.txt", header = TRUE, sep = "\t")

# Get the gene names from the first column
gene_names <- gene_data[, 1]

# Remove the first column from the gene expression data
gene_expr <- gene_data[, -1]

# Convert the gene expression data to a numeric matrix
gene_expr <- as.matrix(gene_expr)

# Calculate the variance for each gene
gene_variances <- apply(gene_expr, 1, var)

# Sort the genes based on variance
sorted_genes <- gene_names[order(gene_variances, decreasing = TRUE)]

# Select the top 1000 most variable genes
top_genes <- sorted_genes[1:1000]

# Filter the gene expression data to include only the top variable genes
filtered_gene_expr <- gene_expr[match(top_genes, gene_names), ]

# Perform clustering and plot the heatmap
heatmap(filtered_gene_expr)

# Perform PCA and plot the results
pca <- prcomp(t(filtered_gene_expr))
plot(pca)
```
